select
from miner_source
where updated=(select MIN(updated) from miner_source where circle_number=(select MAX(circle_number) from miner_source))
and miner_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
order by updated asc

select * from miner_source where circle_number=(select MAX(circle_number) from miner_source )and ( updated BETWEEN (select updated from miner_source where circle_number=(select MAX(circle_number) from miner_source order by updated) limit 1) and (select date_add((select updated from miner_source where circle_number=(select MAX(circle_number) from miner_source order by updated) limit 1), interval 4 second))) order by updated asc

select * from miner_source where updated = #{time}
and miner_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
